title: Hammerer
fluff: The most skilled warriors in a Dwarfholds are the Axedwarves.

reward.name: Mountain Fortress.
reward.value: Upon reaching the title of The Grudgebreaker an axedwarf may establish or build a Mountain Fortress. When the construction is complete, a number of followers will arrive to serve.

specialTalents.name: Hauler.
specialTalents.description: Add your Constitution modifier, if positive, to your gear slots.

specialTalents.name: Shield Block.
specialTalents.description: If you have a shield in a hand, you can use it to block enemy attack. Shield reduces the damage dealt to you by 1d4. Your shield breaks unless you pass a Strength check with DC 9 + original damage dealt.

specialTalents.name: Grudge.
specialTalents.description: You have an advantage on checks related to taking vengeance on the last being that inflicted HP damage to you.

talents.talent: Choose one kind of armor. You get +1 AC from that armor
Choose a talent or +2 points to distribute to ability scores
